com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection

Interface MutableSelection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Selection
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TransformableCanvasSelection, TransformableImageSelection, TransformableSelection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectionTool, AbstractTransformTool, LassoTool, PerspectiveTool, ProjectionTool, RotateTool, RubberSheetTool, ScaleTool, SelectionTool, SlantTool

    public interface MutableSelection
extends Selection
    Represents the state or context of an image selection that can be modified.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resetSelection()
      Transitions to an un-selected state.
      void setDirty()
      Marks the selection as having been mutated (either by transformation or movement).
      void setSelectedImage(BufferedImage image)
      Replaces the current selected image with the given image.
      void setSelectionOutline(Rectangle bounds)
      Specifies the selection rectangle (bounds) of the current selection, i.e., the rectangular path on which "marching ants" will be drawn.
      void translateSelection(int xDelta, int yDelta)
      Invoked to indicate that the selection should be moved on the canvas and therefore the selection shape's coordinates should be translated accordingly.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection.Selection

        crop, getCanvas, getIdentitySelectionFrame, getSelectedImage, getSelectionFrame, getSelectionLocation, hasSelection, redrawSelection

    • Method Detail

      • resetSelection

        void resetSelection()
        Transitions to an un-selected state. Reset the selection boundary to its initial, no-selection state. Selection.getSelectionFrame() should return null following a selection reset, but prior to defining a new selection.

      • setSelectionOutline

        void setSelectionOutline(Rectangle bounds)
        Specifies the selection rectangle (bounds) of the current selection, i.e., the rectangular path on which "marching ants" will be drawn.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The new selection bounds.

      • setDirty

        void setDirty()
        Marks the selection as having been mutated (either by transformation or movement).

      • setSelectedImage

        void setSelectedImage(BufferedImage image)
        Replaces the current selected image with the given image. It is the caller's responsibility to mask the given image to assure it does not exceed the selection bounds.
        Parameters:
        image - The image with which to replace the selection.

      • translateSelection

        void translateSelection(int xDelta,
                        int yDelta)
        Invoked to indicate that the selection should be moved on the canvas and therefore the selection shape's coordinates should be translated accordingly.
        Parameters:
        xDelta - Number of pixels to move selection bounds horizontally.
        yDelta - Number of pixels to move selection bounds vertically.
